label: insider_threat_05_dx_network_forensics_021
content:
## 2024-09-22 Daily Operations Summary

### Netflow Stats
- Total flows: 10887955
- Unique source IPs: 1555
- Unique destination IPs: 3962
- Average flow duration (sec): 36.2
- Top protocol TCP percentage: 83.2
- Top protocol UDP percentage: 13.6
- ICMP percentage: 0.9
- Long-lived flows greater than 1 hour: 133
- East-West traffic percentage: 63.4

### Dns Query Analysis
- Total queries: 3333622
- Unique domains: 63617
- NXDOMAIN responses: 8576
- DGA suspected domains: 0
- DNS over HTTPS queries: 1215
- Average response time (ms): 2.0
- Cache hit percentage: 88.7
- TXT record queries: 670
- PTR queries: 11814

### Ids Ips Hits
- Total alerts: 688
- Blocked by IPS: 93
- Signature matches: 588
- Anomaly detections: 40
- Severity critical: 0
- Severity high: 13
- Severity medium: 72
- Severity low: 420
- Top signatures:
  - ET POLICY SMB2 NT Create File
  - ET SCAN SSH Brute Force Attempt
  - ET EXPLOIT Apache Log4j RCE Attempt
- False positive rate percentage: 11.4

### Bandwidth Utilization
- WAN inbound average (Gbps): 4.79
- WAN outbound average (Gbps): 2.11
- WAN peak (Gbps): 7.45
- LAN core utilization percentage: 36.5
- DMZ utilization percentage: 17.8
- VPN concentrator sessions: 156
- VPN bandwidth (Gbps): 1.19
- Top talker IP: 10.36.70.19
- Top talker bytes (GB): 16.9

### Bgp Changes
- Prefix announcements: 0
- Prefix withdrawals: 0

- Route flaps: 1
- Peer sessions established: 5
- Peer sessions down: 0
- Max prefix warnings: 1
- Communities changed: 1

### Tls Cert Transparency
- CT logs monitored: 4
- New entries for org domains: 0
- Suspicious issuances: 0
- Expired certs in use: 0
- TLS 1.0 connections: 7
- TLS 1.1 connections: 3
- TLS 1.2 connections: 68223
- TLS 1.3 connections: 187750
- Weak cipher usage: 1

### Infrastructure
- Netflow-collector-01:
  - CPU percentage: 58
  - Memory percentage: 58
  - Disk percentage: 62
- Dns-resolver-01:
  - CPU percentage: 31
  - Memory percentage: 58
  - Cache size (GB): 3.1
- Ids-sensor-01:
  - CPU percentage: 39
  - Memory percentage: 59
  - PPS: 82723
- Ids-sensor-02:
  - CPU percentage: 35
  - Memory percentage: 52
  - PPS: 111204
- Border-router-01:
  - CPU percentage: 25
  - Memory percentage: 40
  - Interface errors: 5

### Events
- Bandwidth: WAN peak at 85.3% capacity — normal for time of day
- DNS: DGA-suspected domain marketing-tools.internal — false positive
- NetFlow anomaly: port scan from 10.36.203.95 — automated block applied

### Notes
- Network monitoring daily report 2024-09-22. 10887955 flows analyzed. 3333622 DNS queries. 688 IDS alerts (0 critical, 13 high). WAN avg 4.79/2.11 Gbps in/out. 0 BGP announcements.
